item.description: For our second meetup we'll read The White Tiger by Aravind Adiga, a Booker Prize-winning novel about class struggle in modern India. When the time for the meetup gets closer we'll pin down a venue - I want to check out some places first. But the venue will be somewhere in beautiful Jamaica Plain (not necessarily on Centre Street - the website forced me to submit a real street.) Also, at this meetup, we'll have a book swap. Those who bring a book can take a book. I look forward to round two.
item.name: The White Tiger by Aravind Adiga
